review: The Audio and video freezes up often .Signal seems to stop even though I am about 3 feet from the router. Cumbersome when navigating. However it does let me play the videos I purchased on Amazon.

review: Awesome saved a lot of money with this thing

review: Cost effective low profile way to stream web content!

review: This was a great investment.  It took some adjustment but once we got the hang of it....we have been loving it!!

review: For the price you cant beat it. I have the fire and the fire stick and have saved a fortune by getting rid of cable

review: Love this! Easy set up. Really expands the uses of my hdtv. Will recommend to everybody

review: Love it. I'm downgrading my cable subscription because of all the movie and tv show access I have with the Fire Stick.
